00082 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00083  * Implementation
00084  */
00085 
00086 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00087 namespace ximpl_character
00088 {
00089     class character_state
00090     {
00091     public:
00092         typedef ff_char_t       char_type;
00093         typedef character_state class_type;
00094 
00095     public:
00096         explicit character_state(char_type ch)
00097         {
00098             m_chars[0] = ch;
00099             m_chars[1] = '\0';
00100         }
00101 
00102     public:
00103         char_type const* data() const
00104         {
00105             return m_chars;
00106         }
00107         size_t length() const
00108         {
00109             return 1u;
00110         }
00111 
00112     private:
00113         ff_char_t   m_chars[2];
00114     };
00115 
00116 }/* namespace ximpl_character */
00117 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00118 
00119 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00120  * Inserter functions
00121  */
00122 
00129 inline ximpl_character::character_state character(
00130     ff_char_t const& value
00131 )
00132 {
00133     return ximpl_character::character_state(value);
00134 }
00135
